pageContext.claim: “He wants no petroleum product. He wants no oil or gas. I don't think Texas is going to do too well. They're going to get rid of about 7 million jobs if you go by the Biden plan. I don't think that Oklahoma, North Dakota, Pennsylvania are going to be too happy with that -- and many other states -- Ohio. Mandate all 500,000 school buses and all 3 million government vehicles be changed to zero-emission vehicles within five years. I've heard it worse than that.”
pageContext.analysis: Biden, who won the Democratic primary running as a moderate alternative to more liberal candidates, would not "close down energy" or "everything." In fact, Biden unlike many Democrats who sought the nomination said he would not ban hydraulic fracturing, or fracking.
